name: Pok3 - Mac FireBug on Windows
description:
Pok3 - Mac FireBUg on Windows  (Ver. 1.0)
 Author: Pok3 - http://pok3.deviantart.com

 First Release: 02.01.2009
--------------------------------------------------------------------

 Tested on: Firefox 3.0.5 - ( Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; pt-BR; rv:1.9.0.5) Gecko/2008120122 Firefox/3.0.5)
 * Using the default theme (Strata), and both GrApple Yumy and Delicious. (Recommended)

--------------------------------------------------------------------
 Description:

 Changes the FireBug add-on skin from windows to mac style.
 For those developpers that are also deskmodders, and use the GrApple themes ON WINDOWS :D
--------------------------------------------------------------------
 Supported Extensions:

 - Firebug 1.2.1 (Duh... :D) >>> http://getfirebug.com/

 - FirePHP 0.2.1 >>> http://www.firephp.org/
--------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes:

 -For some reason, i can't change the twisties (+ and - buttons). 
   To change them, u need to swap the images mannualy in your extensions folder...sorry.

 -Sorry for my poor English ¬¬°

 -Feel free to comment and sugest suport for more extensions. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------

discussions.name: Looks awesome, but need major update to new Firebu
